channel.title: Error Getting Client to Connect
channel.description:
Server is online and ready, client however needs work. I have uploaded my client for others to download and they get an error like this when they "Run" the client:
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/connectError1.png[/img]
Client.Java: [code]server = "interpk.no-ip.biz";[/code]
I've tried switching the ip to my static ip and in Jframe.java editing this code:
[code]sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(server));[/code]
to this [code]sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName("myStaticIpHere"));[/code]
People still get similar errors. Could anyone help?

item.title: Error Getting Client to Connect
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

[quote=“cmrchris, post:5, topic:417923”][quote author=c o l d link=topic=520473.msg3780792#msg3780792 date=1318459166]

i think (from what i have learnt) ‘sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(server));’ should not change. That is on My client.java and it works…

Also have a look at line 2664 there’s an error on the coding somewhere these in client.java

Removed my ip from jframe.java ‘sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(myip));’ and put “server” but I still get the same answer & I dont have code on my 2664th line?

try a different client which supports your source, i could help?

What are you proposing?
[/quote] … I’d just jar it if I where you… and also, don’t put “source” put your ip…[/quote]
I didnt put my source -.-
If you look at the run error my IP is at the top, the client doesnt recognize the ip therefore saying unknown source… Also Ive tried to jar it, doesnt make a difference.

Read full topic
